dublin_core.dcvalue: Experts from PATH and HealthEnabled shared their mHealth Mobile Messaging Toolkit The mobile technology marketplace is very dynamic Not only is the technology evolving but so are the infrastructure and politics around mobile communications This toolkit looks to provide frameworks for evaluating the best solution for a mHealth project within this environment
MAMA's mHealth Mobile Messaging Toolkit: Practical Uses and Applications
MAMA's mHealth Mobile Messaging Toolkit: Practical Uses and Applications
MAMA's mHealth Mobile Messaging Toolkit: Practical Uses and Applications
